abstract: Facebook and the Federal Trade Commission are nearing a settlement over deceptive practices, including changes to its privacy settings in 2009.
snippet: Facebook and the Federal Trade Commission are nearing a settlement over deceptive practices, including changes to its privacy settings in 2009.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — Facebook and the Federal Trade Commission are nearing a settlement over deceptive practices related to several Facebook features, including its privacy settings, according to two people briefed on the settlement.

headline.main: F.T.C. Said to Be Near Facebook Privacy Deal
headline.print_headline: F.T.C. Said to Be Near Facebook Privacy Deal
